tool_description: Quickly look up flight information and get both future flight schedules and flight status data.
title: Flight Info API

api_list.name: status
api_list.description: Get flight status information by specifying either the Departure Date or Arrival Date parameter value (mandatory), and other parameters such as Flight Number, Carrier Code, Departure, and Arrival Airport (non-mandatory).

optional_parameters.name: DepartureAirport
optional_parameters.description: A code assigned by the IATA/ICAO/FAA to an airport location representing departure airport. If CodeType not specified, airports are searched by IATA (default). Accepts comma separated values.

optional_parameters.name: AircraftRegistrationNumber
optional_parameters.description: Aircraft registration number (Tail Number).

optional_parameters.name: FlightType
optional_parameters.description: Type of flight: Scheduled, Unscheduled, General Aviation (GA). Accepts comma separated values.

optional_parameters.name: CarrierCode
optional_parameters.description: Carrier (airline) code assigned either by IATA or ICAO.

optional_parameters.name: CodeType
optional_parameters.description: Code type for Carriers and Airports. If not specified, carriers and airports are searched by IATA (default). Code type values are IATA, ICAO - for carriers and airports, FAA - for airports. Accepts comma separated values.

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: Api version.

optional_parameters.name: ArrivalAirport
optional_parameters.description: A code assigned by the IATA/ICAO/FAA to an airport location representing arrival airport. If CodeType not specified, airports are searched by IATA (default). Accepts comma separated values.

optional_parameters.name: DepartureDateTime
optional_parameters.description: Departure date and/or time or date and/or time range is local time in ISO 8601 date format (e.g. YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM] or YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM]/YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM]). The maximum date range is 31 days.

optional_parameters.name: After
optional_parameters.description: A cursor after refers to a random string of characters which marks a specific item in a list of data.

optional_parameters.name: ArrivalDateTime
optional_parameters.description: Arrival date and/or time or date and/or time range is local time in ISO 8601 date format (e.g. YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM] or YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM]/YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM]). The maximum date range is 31 days.

optional_parameters.name: ServiceType
optional_parameters.description: Type of service: Passenger, Cargo. Only flights for the specified service type are returned if specified. Accepts comma separated values.

optional_parameters.name: FlightNumber
optional_parameters.description: A numeric part (up to four digits) of a flight designator.

iata.description: A two-character code of the carrier assigned by IATA.

icao.description: A three-character code of the carrier assigned by ICAO.

serviceSuffix.description: The operational suffix supplied by the carrier.

flightNumber.description: The numeric part (up to 4 digits) of the flight number of the operation.

sequenceNumber.description: Sequence of stopping points starting at 0.

airport.description: Denotes the departure or arrival airport.
Denotes the departure or arrival airport.

aircraftType.description: Denotes the equipment type in use.

iata.description: The single character service type classification (IATA standard) of the flight.

numberOfStops.description: The number of stops for the operation.

items.description: The airports at which any stops occur.

intermediateAirports.description: A list of ports that the operation stops at (if applicable).

operatingAirlineDisclosure.description: Denotes the operating carrier of a flight where seats/space can be sold by one or more airline under its own Carrier code in a codeshare agreement. If null assume carrier code is the operator

code.description: The Carrier code of the owner of the equipment.

name.description: The Carrier name of the owner of the equipment.

aircraftOwner.description: The Carrier code and/or name of the owner of the equipment.

cockpitCrewEmployer.description: The Carrier code and/or name responsible for cockpit crew.

code.description: The Carrier codes that denote when two or three carriers jointly operate the flight.

name.description: The Carrier names that denote when two or three carriers jointly operate the flight.

items.description: The Carrier codes denotes when two or three carriers jointly operate the flight.

jointOperationAirlineDesignators.description: The Carrier codes denote when two or three carriers jointly operate the flight.

items.description: Duplicate flight identifier for an Operating Flight where the Marketing Carrier Code and Service number(s) are disclosed.

marketingFlights.description: Duplicate flight identifier for an Operating Flight where the Marketing Carrier Code and Service number(s) are disclosed.

operatingFlight.description: Duplicate flight identifier for an Operating Flight where the Marketing Carrier Code and Service number(s) are disclosed.

codeshare.description: Denotes the operating carrier of a flight where seats/space can be sold by one or more airline under its own Carrier code in a codeshare agreement. If null assume carrier code is the operator.

state.description: Current state of the flight. A flight can be in the following states: Scheduled, OutGate, InAir, Landed, InGate, Cancelled, Diverted.

actualAircraftType.description: Denotes the equipment type in use.

equipment.description: Represents aircraft registration number and aircraft type.

airport.description: Denotes the departure or arrival airport.
Denotes the departure or arrival airport.

diversionAirport.description: Denotes the departure or arrival airport.
